did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Hospitality Leadership: 1920-1999.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, Photographs, Printed Materials, Research Materials
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correpondence, photographs, memos, programs, and other research files used in the writing of the book Hospitality Leadership: The Cornell Hotel School.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correpondence, photographs, memos, programs, and other research files used in the writing of the book Hospitality Leadership: The Cornell Hotel School.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Hospitality Leadership: The Cornell Hotel School research papers, #28-12-3774. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
